Author: livipup
Text: My chronic illness makes me lose more weight when I eat too much than when I restrict, but it comes at the price of *a lot* of pain. I kind of can't wait until my insurance approves the laxative my gastroenterologist prescribed. Maybe then I can eat a bit more without feeling like my insides are being ripped apart ðŸ˜ª of course, it might also backfire and cause even more pain ðŸ™ƒ
